Package com.example.citywatcherfrontend

Class CityWatcherController

java.lang.Object
com.example.citywatcherfrontend.CityWatcherController
public class CityWatcherController extends Object
Singleton class used to store and retrieve user and location information used across CityWatcher activities.

    • convertGeocodingDataToLocation

      public android.util.Pair<String,com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng> convertGeocodingDataToLocation(String data) throws org.json.JSONException
      Parses through JSON data retrieved from a Geocoding URL connection and returns the formatted address as a String object and the latitude and longitude as a LatLng object.
      Parameters:
      data - JSON data retrieved from a Geocoding URL connection
      Returns:
      The formatted address and LatLng of the location specified in the Geocoding data
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException
